257:3: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasmin vanapradeśe nānāvidharāgaruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatro babhūva|
257:5: bālaiḥ pravālaiḥ sa mahīruhāṇāṃ puṣpādhivāsairmadhubhiśca hyadyaiḥ|
257:7: dharmaṃ parebhyaḥ pravadan yathārhamārtān yathāśakti samuddharaṃśca|
257:9: iti paripālyamānastena mahāsattvena tasmin vanapradeśe sattvakāyaḥ sācāryaka iva bandhumāniva savidya iva rājanvāniva sukhamabhyavardhata|
257:11: sa sattvakāyo'pi tathaiva tena saṃrakṣyamāṇo guṇavṛddhimāpa||3 ||
257:12: atha kadācitsa mahāsattvaḥ sattvānukampayā vanāntarāṇi samanuvicaraṃstīvravedanābhibhavādviceṣṭamānaṃ digdhaviddhamivānyatamasmin vanapradeśe reṇusaṃparkavyākulamalinake sarasaṭaṃ sihaṃ dadarśa|
257:13: samabhigamya cainaṃ karuṇayā paricodyamānaḥ papraccha-kimidaṃ mṛgarāja ?
257:16: kṛtaṃ tavāsvāsthyamidaṃ śrameṇa vyādheṣuṇā vā rujayā kayācit||4||
257:17: tad brūhi vācyaṃ mayi cedidaṃ te yadeva vā kṛtyamihocyatāṃ tat|
257:18: mamāsti yā mitragatā ca śaktistatsādhyasaukhyasya bhavān sukhī ca||5||
257:19: siṃha uvāca-sādho pakṣivara ! na me śramajātamidamasvāsthyaṃ rujayā vyādheṣuṇā vā|
257:20: idaṃ tvasthiśakalaṃ galāntare vilagnaṃ śalyamiva māṃ bhṛśaṃ dunoti|
257:25: atha bodhisattvaḥ paṭuvijñānatvādvicintya śalyoddharaṇopāyaṃ tadvacanaviṣkambhapramāṇaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya taṃ siṃhamuvāca-yā te śaktistayā samyak tāvatsvamukhaṃ nirvyādehīti|
257:27: atha bodhisattvastadasya kāṣṭhaṃ dantapālyorantare samyagniveśya praviśya cāsya galamūlaṃ tattiryagavasthitimasthiśakalaṃ vadanāgreṇābhihṛtyaikasmin pradeśe samutpāditaśaithilyamitarasmin parigṛhya paryante vicakarṣa|
257:31: uddhṛtya śalyena sahaiva tasya duḥkhaṃ ca tatsaṃjanitāṃ śucaṃ ca|
257:34: prasādhya saukhyaṃ vyasanaṃ nivartya vā sahāpi duḥkhena parasya sajjanaḥ|
257:35: upaiti tāṃ prītiviśeṣasaṃpadaṃ na yāṃ svasaukhyeṣu sukhāgateṣvapi||8||
257:36: iti sa mahāsattvastasya tadduḥkhamupaśamayya prītahṛdayastamāmantrya siṃhaṃ pratinanditastena yatheṣṭaṃ jagāma|
257:37: atha sa kadācitpravitataruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatraḥ paribhraman kiṃcitkvacit tadvidhamāhārajātamanāsādya kṣudagniparigatatanustameva siṃhamacirahastasya hariṇataruṇasya māṃsamupabhuñjānaṃ tadrudhirānurañjitavadananakharakesarāgraṃ saṃdhyāprabhāsamālabdhaṃ śaranmeghavicchedamiva dadarśa|
257:38: kṛtopakāro'pi tu na prasehe vaktuṃ sa yācñāvirasākṣaraṃ tam|
257:40: kāryānurodhāttu tathāpi tasya cakṣuṣpathe hrīvidhuraṃ cacāra|
257:41: sa cānupaśyannapi taṃ durātmā nimantraṇāmapyakaronna tasya||10||
257:42: śilātale bījamiva prakīrṇaṃ hutaṃ ca śāntoṣmaṇi bhasmapuñje|
257:43: samaprakāraṃ phalayogakāle kṛtaṃ kṛtaghne vidule ca puṣpam||11||
257:44: atha bodhisattvo nūnamayaṃ māṃ na pratyabhijānīta iti nirviśaṅkataraḥ samabhigamyainamarthivṛttyā prayuktayuktāśīrvādaḥ saṃvibhāgamayācata-
257:47: ityāśīrvādamadhuramapyucyamāno'tha siṃhaḥ krauryamātsaryaparicayādanucitāryavṛttiḥ kopāgnidīptayātipiṅgalayā didhakṣanniva vivartitayā dṛṣṭyā bodhisattvamīkṣamāṇa uvāca-mā tavadbhoḥ|
257:48: dayāklaibyaṃ na yo veda khādana visphurato mṛgān|
257:49: praviśya tasya me vaktraṃ yajjīvasi na tadbahu||13||
257:51: jīvitena nu khinno'si paraṃ lokaṃ didṛkṣase||14||
257:52: atha bodhisattvastena tasya rūkṣākṣarakrameṇa pratyākhyānavacasā samupajātavrīḍastatraiva nabhaḥ samutpapāta|
257:54: athānyatamā vanadevatā tasya tamasatkāramasahamānā dhairyaprayāmajijñāsayā vā samutpatya taṃ mahāsattvamuvāca-pakṣivara,
257:62: atha bodhisattvastathāpyasatkāraviprakṛtaḥ protsāhyamāno'pi tayā vanadevatayā svāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ pradarśayannuvāca-alamalamanena krameṇa|
257:64: ārte pravṛttiḥ sādhūnāṃ kṛpayā na tu lipsayā|
257:65: tāmavaitu paro mā vā tatra kopasya ko vidhiḥ||16||
257:66: vañcanā sā ca tasyaiva yanna vetti kṛtaṃ paraḥ|
257:67: ko hi pratyupakārārthī tasya bhūyaḥ kariṣyati||17||
257:72: upakṛtaṃ kila vetti na me parastadapakāramiti prakaroti yaḥ|
257:73: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśastanuṃ dviradavṛttimabhipratipadyate||20||
257:74: na vetti cedupakṛtamāturaḥ paro na yokṣyate'pi sa guṇakāntayā śriyā|
257:75: sacetasaḥ punaratha ko bhavetkramaḥ samucchritaṃ pramathitumātmano yaśaḥ||21||
257:79: atha sā devatā tatsubhāṣitaprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhviti punaruktamabhipraśasya tattatpriyamuvāca-
257:81: na veṣamātraṃ hi munitvasiddhaye guṇairupetastviha tattvato muniḥ||23||
257:83: tadevaṃ protsāhyamāno'pi sādhurnālaṃ pāpe pravartitumanabhyāsāditi sajjanapraśaṃsāyāṃ vācyam|
257:86: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam|
257:87: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca-evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti|
